titleStmt.title: A narative [sic] of some of the sufferings of J.P. in the city of Rome
titleStmt.author: J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?
Bayley, Charles. Third of the sixth month, 1661, from the common goal in Burkdou in France.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Perrot by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"The third of the sixth month 1661. From the common goal in Burkdou in France ..." on p. 11-16 signed: Charles Bayly.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
